mapper.select: select rn,c.* from(select Rownum as rn,a.*,star from camping_table a, (select c_cam_no, avg(c_campingstar) as star from campingreview_table group by c_cam_no) b where a.cam_no=b.c_cam_no ORDER BY a.cam_no desc) c where RN >=#{from} and RN <=#{to}
select * from campingreview_table where c_cam_no = ${c_cam_no} order by c_no desc
select * from campingheart_table order by h_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from campingheart_table where h_cam_no=#{h_cam_no} and h_u_id=#{h_u_id}
mapper.select: select h_cam_name from campingheart_table where h_cam_no=#{h_cam_no} and h_u_id=#{h_u_id}
select count(*) from camping_table where cam_name like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by cam_no desc
